limmen.id2212.nog.client.model

Class ClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • limmen.id2212.nog.client.model.ClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Remote, Client

    public class ClientImpl
extends UnicastRemoteObject
implements Client
    Implementation of the client-interface. Extends UniCastRemoteObject to automaticly export the remote object.
    Author:
    kim
    See Also:
